imageSize[source]

imageSize(path_image:str)

{% endraw %}

Display Image

Display single image.

Args:

  • path_dir : path to directory
  • figsize : figure size to display, default 3 x 3(H x W)

Return:

  • None
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

displayImage[source]

displayImage(path_dir:Path, figsize:tuple=(3, 3))

{% endraw %}

Display Images TarBar

Note: ONLY APPLICABLE IN COLAB

Display multiple images in TarBar layout.

Args:

  • path_dir : path to directory
  • first : first image id(inclusive) to display in a sequence
  • last : last image id(exclusive) to display in a sequence
  • start_last : start diplaying from last, default = False
  • figsize : figure size to display, default 3 x 3(H x W)

Return:

  • None
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

displayTarBarImage[source]

displayTarBarImage(path_dir:Path, first:int, last:int, start_last=False, figsize:tuple=(3, 3))

{% endraw %}

Display Images Grid Random

Note: ONLY APPLICABLE IN COLAB

Display multiple random images in Grid layout.

Args:

  • path_dir : path to directory
  • total_img : total number of image to display
  • grid_row : rows to display, default=3
  • grid_col : cols to display, default=3
  • figsize : figure size to display, default 3 x 3(H x W)

Return:

  • None
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

displayGridRandom[source]

displayGridRandom(path_dir:Path, total_img:int, grid_row:int=3, grid_col:int=3, figsize:tuple=(3, 3))

Display random selected images w/Colab widget Grid (to use only in Colab). Args path_dir : path to image directory total_img : total number of images to be displayed row : select number of grid row col : select number of grid column figsize : H,W of figure size to be displayed Return None

{% endraw %}
